subproject.description:
Output 1: Seed policy and seed ordinance issues addressed and capacity enhanced in planning, implementation and monitoring seed programmes.

Output 2:  Appropriate technology in seed production, processing, quality control introduced.

Output 3. Enhanced capacity of farmers in seed conditioning, seed certification for relevant farm managers and extension staff through hands-on use of model seed cleaning equipment and seed testing facilities (including those already established by SDC), and through training and study tours 

Output 4: Farmer's awareness raised in using quality seeds,  certified seed of improved varieties;  and exposure to regional experience in seed production systems for rice and vegetables, with emphasis on China as a model
subproject.title: Improved Seed Production for S

title: Improved Seed Production for Sustainable Agriculture
